SEARCH
Package com.bank.auth_service.exception

Class RestExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.bank.auth_service.exception.RestExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class RestExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the authentication service. Handles custom exceptions and returns appropriate HTTP responses with error messages.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0, 06/23/2025
Author:
Fernando Cruz Cavina

    • handlerCredentialsLogin

      @ExceptionHandler(InvalidUserCredentialsException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageHandler> handlerCredentialsLogin(InvalidUserCredentialsException ex)
      Handles InvalidUserCredentialsException and returns a 400 BAD REQUEST response.
      Parameters:
      ex - the thrown InvalidUserCredentialsException
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a MessageHandler with BAD_REQUEST status and error message
